ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
The diffpy.srfit package provides the framework for building a global
optimizer on the fly from components such as function calculators
(that calculate different data spectra), regression algorithms and
structure models. The software is capable of co-refinement using
multiple information sources or models. It provides a uniform interface
for various regression algorithms. The target function being optimized
can be specified by the user according to the data available.
about.summary: Open source (the license is 100% compatible with bsd-3 clause) configurable code for solving atomic structures.

about.description:
The diffpy.srfit package provides the framework for building a global
optimizer on the fly from components such as function calculators
(that calculate different data spectra), regression algorithms and
structure models. The software is capable of co-refinement using
multiple information sources or models. It provides a uniform interface
for various regression algorithms. The target function being optimized
can be specified by the user according to the data available.
about.summary: Open source (the license is 100% compatible with bsd-3 clause) configurable code for solving atomic structures.

name: diffpy.srfit
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "diffpy.srfit" %}
{% set version = "3.2.0" %}
{% set python_min = "3.11" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/diffpy_srfit/diffpy_srfit-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 46be52c7304a2f244c05dbefbc5510803a60ac583a17def84591687dc03617c2

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed .

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
    - setuptools-git-versioning >=2.0
    - pip

  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy
    - matplotlib-base
    - scipy

test: 
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }} 
    - pip
    - pytest
    - sympy
  source_files:
    - tests
  commands:
    - pip check
    - pytest

about:
  home: https://github.com/diffpy/diffpy.srfit/
  license: LicenseRef-diffpy
  license_file: LICENSE.rst
  summary: Open source (the license is 100% compatible with bsd-3 clause) configurable code for solving atomic structures.
  description: |
    The diffpy.srfit package provides the framework for building a global 
    optimizer on the fly from components such as function calculators 
    (that calculate different data spectra), regression algorithms and 
    structure models. The software is capable of co-refinement using 
    multiple information sources or models. It provides a uniform interface 
    for various regression algorithms. The target function being optimized 
    can be specified by the user according to the data available.
  doc_url: http://www.diffpy.org/diffpy.srfit/
  dev_url: https://github.com/diffpy/diffpy.srfit

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - cadenmyers13
    - Tieqiong
    - sbillinge
